description: Retrospective consent for the erection of a side dormer roof extension; erection of a single storey extension covering part of front courtyard and replacement of existing conservatory together with a roof lantern above; installation of a new rooflight above the existing kitchen; alterations to south western elevation to include infilling of the existing door, installation of high level clerestory window, new window to replace the existing doors to study room, erection of new fencing and boundary wall with railings on top together with 2no brick piers to replace the existing front boundary, and installation of new entrance gate; installation of new entrance door and window to north western elevation at ground floor level; formation of bin store to front courtyard elevation; internal alterations at ground floor level to include installation of new doors in place of window opening in between hallway and studio living/dining room, formation of a storage cupboard in the hallway area, infilling of the existing door and installation of a new door in between the kitchen and study room to, new shelving in the kitchen and removal of existing partitions in between the kitchen and existing conservatory to form an open plan kitchen; associated internal and external alterations. (revised description)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
